name: pnp-mgt-samples-mgt-login-spfx
title: Using login control in SPFx with React
shortDescription: Using the mgt-login component in a SharePoint Framework web part with React
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use the Microsoft Graph Toolkit login component in a SharePoint Framework web part with React.

references.name: Getting started with the Microsoft Graph Toolkit in React
references.description: The Microsoft Graph Toolkit components can easily be added to your web application, SharePoint web part, or Microsoft Teams tabs.
